item.description:
Join us for further explorations of the northwest corner of Myles Standish.  We will hike into Myles Standish from a side road off of Federal Furnace Road.  I just visited this trail with CJ and Rose and they found it very enjoyable.  Highlights include "Wheelbarrow Hollow".

 

We try to go out for about two hours. This area had a few hills.  We will attempt to minimize the bushwhacking this time.  Bring water and snacks and wear good hiking shoes.

Breakfast at 8:00 at the Panera Bread in the Shops at Five (near Exit 5 off Route 3) if you are able.
item.how_to_find_us: Bettencourt Road is a dirt road off Federal Furnace Road. Its entrance is near the Ellis Haven campgrounds (opposite side)

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Death March -- part 2
